Row.Text: [B]PYU[/B] was from the same continent as [B]Songhai[/B].
[B]Amina[/B] was from the same continent as [B]PYU[/B].
[B]Harriet Tubman's[/B] ancestors came from the same continent as [B]PYU[/B].
[B]Ibn Battuta[/B] traveled in the same region as [B]PYU[/B].
The [B]Xerxes, The Achaemenid[/B] offer a complementary playstyle to [B]PYU[/B].
